charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1101_0100_:
While taking a stroll in the forest one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] ran into Kris.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1101_0200_:
She seemed to be in the middle of observing her
Totodile and jotting down some notes.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_0300_:
Heh heh heh. I guess Berries are no problem
for you, Totodile, with the way your teeth crunch
through everything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_0400_: You look like you’re having fun!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_0500_: Yeah, observing Totodile like this is so much fun!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_0600_: I wouldn’t want to be bitten by her!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_0700_:
You have no idea how many times she’s tried to
bite me...
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_0800_:
And despite Totodile’s funny nature, there’s
no reason for her to ever change, either.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_0900_: She’s always been like this, you know.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1000_:
Ever since we went on our journey. And she
hasn’t really changed since we came to
Pasio, either.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1100_: I wish I could stay the same like her.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_1300_: Rather, I feel like I have to change.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_1500_: Yeah. She’s always so energetic and optimistic.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1600_:
My goal has always been to learn everything
there is to know about Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1700_:
But I’ve started thinking that trying to master
everything would only make me into a
jack-of-all-trades...and a master of none.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1800_:
All the famous professors have their field of
expertise, and they carry their subject further
and further.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1900_:
And here I am, trying to know everything...
I should at least figure out whether I’m going to
specialize in battles or ecology.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_2100_:
Well, they’re both really interesting fields, so
I’m having a hard time figuring out which one
to choose.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_2200_:
You want to master
Pokémon ecology?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_2300_:
Well, they’re both really interesting fields, so
I’m having a hard time figuring out which one
to choose.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2400_:
But Professor Oak is already perfecting the study
of Pokémon ecology.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2500_:
And Agatha is already on the path to becoming
a master of Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2600_: I have to find my own path, just like they did.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2700_: What do you think I should do, Totodile?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2800_: That’s a tough question, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2900_: What path would be best for me...
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_3000_:
Why not ask one of those
famous people?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_3200_:
Why not look for that path
with Totodile?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_3400_:
Oh, never mind me. This is my problem.
I should make the decision on my own.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_3500_:
You don’t have to do it
all on your own.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_3700_: I’ll help any way I can.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_3900_:
Thanks.
I appreciate the concern—and your support.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4100_:
As long as I’m on Pasio, Totodile and I 
will do this. We’ll meet and talk to 
as many people as we can!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4200_: No, not just talk to them—battle them, too!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4300_:
Yeah! No more dwelling on this alone! I’m gonna
ask for more help from you guys in the future!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_4600_: You can come to us for anything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_4700_:
Thanks, guys!
And [Name:PlayerNickname ], if you ever
need somebody to talk to, you can count on me!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4800_:
I’ll use my knowledge to help you solve
your problems!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0100_:
Hey, since we’re crossing paths here, 
let’s have a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0200_: Sure! Totodile and I are ready for anything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0300_:
All right! Then time for a serious battle with
pretty ol’ me!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0101_0100_:
I think your Pokémon is going to change after
this battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0100_: I lost? But I’m so pretty... How is this possible?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0200_:
You might be cuter, but I won’t let that stop me
from winning!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0300_:
You think I’m...
Waaah! That makes me so happy!
Say it again!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0400_:
Hm?
Totodile’s acting strange...
Oh, she’s evolving!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0500_:
That’s great, Totodile!
You’re going to get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0100_: You there! Let’s have a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0200_:
Well, that came out of nowhere, but we’re ready
for anything! Bring it on!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0300_:
You and your Pokémon are just as good as
people say you are!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0101_0100_:
My Pokémon and your Pokémon—let’s see which
one’s tougher!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0100_:
To think that you are tougher than us...
Your Croconaw truly is amazing.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0200_:
Thanks!
I think Croconaw is great, too!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0300_:
Not only that—Croconaw looks like she’s about
to evolve from that last battle. She IS great!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0400_:
Croconaw! You’re going to evolve!
That’s amazing!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0500_: I’m so happy for you, Croconaw!
